caption.center: Contrell Floyd, Appellant, v. The State of Florida, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

opinion.posture: An Appeal under Florida Rule of Appellate Procedure 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Miami-Dade County, Lawrence A. Schwartz, Judge. Lower Tribunal No. 00-21519.
opinion.attorneys:
Contrell Floyd, in proper person.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before SUAREZ, ROTHENBERG, and LAGOA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
Not final until disposition of timely filed motion for rehearing.
